definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
Zhang Yang (1967-), PRC film director and screenwriter
to display ostentatiously/to bring out into the open/to make public/to spread around/flamboyant/brash
Zhang Yang (1967-), PRC film director and screenwriter
to display ostentatiously/to bring out into the open/to make public/to spread around/flamboyant/brash
to open a business/first transaction of a business day
Zhang Yining (1981-), PRC female table tennis player and Olympic gold medalist
Cecilia Cheung (1980-), Hong Kong actress and pop singer
Zhang Ning (1975-), PRC female badminton player and Olympic gold medalist
Zhangjiajie prefecture level city in Hunan, formerly Dayong 大庸[Da4 yong1]

sentences.english: Mr Wei rushed to Taipei during his rest day on a Sunday to see Mr Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 魏姓同学便利用星期日赶到台北和张先生见面。

sentences.english: Zhang Haizhou engages with people well.
sentences.chinese: 张海洲和周围人相处得很好。

sentences.english: But the way , have you seen Mr Zang . our manager ?
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一声，你见到我们的张经理吗？

sentences.english: Donation of 550 wheelchairs at Qinyang, Henan on May 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 天邻基金会捐赠550张轮椅河南省沁阳市残疾人士。

sentences.english: I took a picture so you can see the label.
sentences.chinese: 我拍了张像片所以你们能够看到这个标签。

sentences.english: At the flower show I thought of that Christmas card.
sentences.chinese: 在花展上我想到了那张圣诞贺卡。

sentences.english: Sex one-inch colour photos of the students are needed.
sentences.chinese: 需办理接送卡的学生交家长一寸相片2张。

sentences.english: One chooses one thing over another and people always think 'there could have been a better way'.
sentences.chinese: 张颐武认为，青春更多的是一个精神层面上的概念。

sentences.english: We found the poster on a partition door in the Villa of the East Garden.
sentences.chinese: 在东园别墅的一道隔扇门上，我们找到了那张捷报。

sentences.english: His wallet contained a five-dollar bill.
sentences.chinese: 他钱包里有张五美元的钞票。

sentences.english: Zhang Jingjing has been the face of silent tears fall quietly.
sentences.chinese: 张晶晶脸上无声的泪水已悄然滑落。

sentences.english: Luke took a picture of his family.
sentences.chinese: 卢克给全家照了张相片。

sentences.english: Around 50 of his images were presented on a giant screen. And the critics lapped them up.
sentences.chinese: 大概有50张左右的图片被展示在巨大的屏幕上。

sentences.english: But Wang has insisted Zhang simply tripped, AFP reported.
sentences.chinese: 但法新社报道称，王坚持说张只是自己摔倒了。

sentences.english: It was aunt Zhangwho helped her.

definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
